sentence: Adam Kinzinger will be retiring from Congress later this year, and Liz Cheney faces a difficult primary challenge in her home state of Wyoming against Harriet Hageman, who has been endorsed by top GOP leaders like House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-CA).
author: Paul Bois
title: Anti-Trumpers Liz Cheney, Adam Kinzinger to Attend CPAC Counterprogramming' Summit

sentence: Adam Kinzinger will be retiring from Congress later this year, and Liz Cheney faces a difficult primary challenge in her home state of Wyoming against Harriet Hageman, who has been endorsed by top GOP leaders like House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-CA).
author: Paul Bois
title: Anti-Trumpers Liz Cheney, Adam Kinzinger to Attend CPAC Counterprogramming' Summit

sentence: Meanwhile, some top national Trump antagonists, including Republican Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Sen. Lisa Murkowski of Alaska, have not backed away from seeking reelection despite Trump promising for more than a year that he'd make sure they were defeated.
author: Associated Press
title: Trump returns to Georgia confronting test of his grip on GOP
